attributes.action: Parliament to ratify the EU referendum with a vote before invoking Article 50
attributes.background: By signing this petition we call upon our elected representatives to use the experience, judgement and knowledge for which they were elected to protect the best interests of their constituency by voting on the result of the EU referendum before official notification is given to the European Council.

rejection.details:
we think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
